          Adds content to the main area listbox when any new content arrives at the client

          Command: Sets the users current location Based on a predefined location defined on the StreamSpin webpage, and retrieved by the client at login time
private  class StreamSpinClient.setProfile
          Command: sets the current interest profile of the user.
private  class StreamSpinClient.startService
          Command: starts a service
private  class StreamSpinClient.startUpLoadingScreen
          Constructs a "loading screen" which is shown until the client gets an answer from StreamSpin.

initializeFeature

public void initializeFeature(com.google.gwt.gadgets.client.DynamicHeightFeature heightFeature)
Initializes the DynamicHeightFeature, enabling the gadget to adjust its height (it is impossible adjust its width, it is determined by the page it is placed on).

Specified by:
initializeFeature in interface com.google.gwt.gadgets.client.NeedsDynamicHeight

initializeFeature

public void initializeFeature(com.google.gwt.gadgets.client.IntrinsicFeature feature)
Initializes the IntrinsicFeature enabling the compiled Java Script to call StreamSpin.com, no matter what domain the gadget is hosted on.

getIntrinsics

public static com.google.gwt.gadgets.client.IntrinsicFeature getIntrinsics()
Since the IntrinsicFeature can only be initialized in the main class, this function allows other classes to call a url.

The IntrinsicFeature variable

showLogin

protected void showLogin()
Constructs the login screen show at client startup. It also takes care of contacting StreamSpin and handing program control over to StreamSpinClient.startUpLoadingScreen
